title: The Platform
description: In a dystopian prison, inmates on different levels of a vertical structure receive food through a platform. As supplies dwindle on the way down, the brutal fight for survival begins.

title: The Last Of Us
description: Twenty years after a fungal outbreak devastated civilization, a hardened survivor is hired to smuggle a teenage girl across the country—only to discover she might be humanity’s last hope.

title: Bird Box
description: In a world ravaged by mysterious entities that cause mass suicides when seen, a woman must journey with two children to safety—blindfolded—through dangerous terrain.
